translated: Listen, (name of the candidate), you who have previously aspired, thinking, Oh, if only I could go forth and be fully ordained in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, and attain the state of a fully ordained nun, and you who are suitable as a preceptor and suitable as a teacher, and the Saṅgha is in agreement, and the irreversible four-part proclamation has been established, you have gone forth and been fully ordained.

original: de ni mchog tu 'dod par bya ba yang dag pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa nyid brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mchog tu 'dod par bya ba yang dag pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa nyid brjod pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the completion by way of the highest desire.

original: de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyis mnyam par gyur pa nyid sgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyis mnyam par gyur pa nyid sgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: After that, one should express the certainty of application to the practice of equality through morality.

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig / bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de la de ring bsnyen par rdzogs pas kyang bslab bo //
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig / bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de la de ring bsnyen par rdzogs pas kyang bslab bo //
translated: “Listen, (name)! Whatever training a nun who has received full ordination for one hundred years should train in, that very training a nun who has received full ordination today should train in.

original: de ring bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong mas bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pas kyang bslab bo //
analyzed: de ring bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong mas bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pas kyang bslab bo //
translated: Whatever training a nun who has received full ordination today should train in, that very training a nun who has received full ordination for one hundred years should train in.

original: de ltar na tshul khrims nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / bslab pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na tshul khrims nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / bslab pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste /
translated: Thus, through morality itself, through training itself, and through reciting the Prātimokṣa itself,

original: khyod kyis deng phyin chad bsgrub par bya'i mi sgrub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis deng phyin chad bsgrub par bya'i mi sgrub par mi bya'o //
translated: from now on you should practice and not not practice.”

original: de ni tshul khrims kyis mnyam par gyur pa nyid bsgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de ni tshul khrims kyis mnyam par gyur pa nyid bsgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the rite for the candidate’s entry into the rite of the vow of morality.

original: de'i 'og tu tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Then, the candidate should be led to the reflection on the image of the rite.

original: deng phyin chad khyod kyi sa mkhan mo la ma'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: deng phyin chad khyod kyi sa mkhan mo la ma'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: “From this day forward, you should establish the perception of your preceptor as a mother.

original: mkhan mos khyod la bu mo'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan mos khyod la bu mo'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The preceptor should establish the perception of you as a daughter.

original: khyod kyis deng phyin chad mkhan mo la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis deng phyin chad mkhan mo la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bya'o //
translated: From this day forward, you should serve the preceptor as long as you live.

original: mkhan mos kyang khyod shi'am sos kyi bar du nad g-yog bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan mos kyang khyod shi'am sos kyi bar du nad g-yog bya'o //
translated: The preceptor should nurse you as long as you live, even if you were to die.

original: de ni tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges @140b par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de ni tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges @140b par sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the rite for leading the candidate to the reflection on the image of the rite.

original: de'i 'og tu dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Then, the candidate should be led to the reflection on the rite of the vow of morality.

original: deng phyin chad khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang / gnas brtan mo rnams dang / bar rnams dang / gsar bu rnams la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhes dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: deng phyin chad khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang / gnas brtan mo rnams dang / bar rnams dang / gsar bu rnams la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhes dang bcas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du gyur par gnas par bya'o //
translated: and with a sense of shame.

original: de ni dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the definite commitment to living in a disciplined way.

original: de'i 'og tu dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: After that, you should be definitely committed to accomplishing your purpose.

original: deng phyin chad khyod kyis lung mnod par bya /🔽klag par bya /
analyzed: deng phyin chad khyod kyis lung mnod par bya / klag par bya /
translated: From now on, you should receive the scriptures,🔽recite them,

original: kha ton bya'o //
analyzed: kha ton bya'o //
translated: and chant them.

original: phung po la mkhas pa dang ; khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: phung po la mkhas pa dang ; khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: You should become skilled in the aggregates, skilled in the constituents, skilled in the sources, skilled in dependent origination, and skilled in what is correct and what is incorrect.

original: ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis brtson pa mi dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis brtson pa mi dor bar bya'o //
translated: You should not abandon your efforts to obtain what you have not obtained, to realize what you have not realized, and to actualize what you have not actualized.

original: de ni dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is the definite engagement in the accomplishment of the purpose.

original: de'i 'og tu ma brjod pa yang dag par blangs pas yongs su shes pa'i sgrub par 'gyur ba nyid kyang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ma brjod pa yang dag par blangs pas yongs su shes pa'i sgrub par 'gyur ba nyid kyang brjod par bya ste /
translated: After that, you should also state the accomplishment of complete understanding through the correct adoption of what has not been stated.

original: 'di dag ni kho bos khyod la bslab pa'i gzhi che long che long tsam zhig brjod par zad de /
analyzed: 'di dag ni kho bos khyod la bslab pa'i gzhi che long che long tsam zhig brjod par zad de /

analyzed: gzhan dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: You will hear the others every half month when the Sūtra of Individual Liberation is recited.

original: gzhan dag kyang slob dpon dang / mkhan mo dang / mkhan mo gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang / smos 'drin dang ; 'grogs bshes rnams kyang rgya ches ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang slob dpon dang / mkhan mo dang / mkhan mo gcig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / phebs par smra ba dang / smos 'drin dang ; 'grogs bshes rnams kyang rgya ches ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will also be a teacher, preceptor, co-resident, co-student, friend, companion, associate, and intimate of others.

analyzed: de ni ma brjod pa yang dag par blangs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgrub par 'gyur ba nyid brjod pa'o //

analyzed: khyod ni bsnyen par rdzogs bar gyur //

analyzed: 'di dag ji lta bzhin du bsgrubs //
translated: so practice them as they are.🔽The beautiful one who goes forth,

analyzed: mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang // yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par //

analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te //

analyzed: mkhyen te // bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to // de ni gus pa la nge @141a * //

analyzed: par sbyar ba'o //

analyzed: / dge slong ma'i rab tu byung ba'i gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so /

translated: If a monk, for himself, has a dwelling built that he has started and that is ownerless, that monk should seek a suitable basis, one that is free from dispute and suitable for beginning, and request the Saṅgha to point it out.

analyzed: gal te de na sbrul gyi gnas sam /

translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba /
translated: Venerables, this monk is a proponent of the Dharma,

original: 'dul ba smra ba /
analyzed: 'dul ba smra ba /
translated: a proponent of the Vinaya,🔽and a proponent of the Teacher.

original: dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa /
translated: This monk has taken up and upholds the Dharma and Vinaya and uses it to make conventional designations.

original: dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This monk speaks with knowledge, not without knowledge.

original: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Do not say, ‘We agree with and accept what this monk agrees with and accepts.’ And why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin /
translated: Venerable ones, this monk is not a proponent of the Dharma.

original: 'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi /
translated: He is not a proponent of the Vinaya.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba /
translated: Venerable ones, this monk is a proponent of what is not the Dharma.

original: 'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba /
analyzed: 'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba /
translated: He is a proponent of what is not the Vinaya.

original: dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa /
translated: This monk has taken up and upholds what is not the Dharma and what is not the Vinaya and uses it to make conventional designations.

original: dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This monk speaks without knowledge, not with knowledge.

original: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig / tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge 'dun 'byed par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par
analyzed: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig / tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge 'dun 'byed par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par
translated: Venerables, do not split the Saṅgha. Venerables, agree to the Saṅgha being in concord.

original: gyis shig ; tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig / dge 'dun mthun mi phyed /
analyzed: gyis shig ; tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig / dge 'dun mthun mi phyed /
translated: Venerables, be in concord with the Saṅgha. The Saṅgha is in concord, not divided.

original: kun tu dga' mi rtsod /
analyzed: kun tu dga' mi rtsod /
translated: It is happy, not disputing,

original: mchog gcig /'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la /
analyzed: mchog gcig /'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la /
translated: it is of one Ājñātakauṇḍinya, and of one voice, like water and milk.

original: ston pa'i stan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi ;
analyzed: ston pa'i stan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi ;
translated: If it is in concord, it will shine forth the Teacher’s teaching, and will remain in comfort.🔽Venerables, give up this splitting of the Saṅgha, this discord, this dispute.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rje su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rje su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na /
translated: If he does this, and then gives the order with a four-part formal act of announcement,

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko ka li ka dang / kha na da hrab bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par brjod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko ka li ka dang / kha na da hrab bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par brjod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
translated: Those who are in favor of the announcement to Kokālika, Kaṭamorakatiṣya, Kaṭa, and Samudradatta by means of the four-announcement legal procedure should remain silent. Those who do not agree should speak. This is the first announcement.

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: In the same way, he should repeat it a second and a third time.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
translated: If the Sangha accepts it,

original: dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang / ka na da drab bya dang / ka ti mo @147b ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang / ka na da drab bya dang / ka ti mo @147b ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
translated: the Sangha will announce to Kokālika, Kaṭamorakatiṣya, Kaṭa, and Samudradatta by means of the four-announcement legal procedure.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since there is silence, that is how it will be upheld.

original: de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the ritual and legal procedure for announcing to those who side with the schism in the Sangha in order to stop them.

original: khyim sun 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i skabs nas khyim sun 'byin pa la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: khyim sun 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i skabs nas khyim sun 'byin pa la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The Buddha said, “In the case of the remaining vows of the fully ordained monks who cause householders to lose faith, they should be ordered to stop causing householders to lose faith.”🔽This is how it is done.

original: dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong ngam grong rdal zhig na nye bar brten cing gnas par gyur la /
analyzed: dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong ngam grong rdal zhig na nye bar brten cing gnas par gyur la /
translated: If a large number of fully ordained monks live near a village or town,

original: de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par gyur cing /
analyzed: de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par gyur cing /
translated: and they cause householders to lose faith by engaging in negative actions,

original: de dag gis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong ngam /
analyzed: de dag gis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong ngam /
translated: if they see that the householders have lost faith,

original: thos sam / rab tu shes sam /
analyzed: thos sam / rab tu shes sam /
translated: or if they hear about it or understand it well,

original: de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod par mthong ngam /
analyzed: de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod par mthong ngam /
translated: and if they see that the monks are engaging in negative actions,

original: thos sam / rab tu shes na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
analyzed: thos sam / rab tu shes na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
translated: or if they hear about it or understand it well, then the monks should say to those monks, “Venerables, you are causing householders to lose faith by engaging in negative actions.

original: khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
analyzed: khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
translated: We see, hear, and understand well that you have caused householders to lose faith.

original: byed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes kyi /
analyzed: byed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes kyi /
translated: You see and hear and know that they are committing all sorts of evil deeds.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed 'di ni gnas pas chog gi gnas 'di nas deng shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed 'di ni gnas pas chog gi gnas 'di nas deng shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: You should tell them, ‘Venerables, this is not the right place for you. Leave this monastery.’

original: gal te de dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'di ni dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
analyzed: gal te de dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'di ni dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
translated: “If they say to the monks, ‘Venerables, some monks are acting out of desire,🔽hatred,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /🔽gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba / gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: ignorance,

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba dag gyin te /🔽'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba khon na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba dag gyin te / 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba khon na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
translated: and fear.

original: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na /
analyzed: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na /
translated: Some monks are expelling us, while others are not expelling us, even though we have committed the same offense,’

original: dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: the monks should first admonish those monks in private,

original: 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: saying,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gnas brten gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ril dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gnas brten gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ril dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: Venerable Ājñāta-Kauṇḍinya and Venerable Upasena, do not say that you are going out of desire,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: out of hatred,🔽out of ignorance,🔽or out of fear.

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
translated: Do not say to the monks, ‘Venerables, here some monks are going out of desire,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: out of hatred,

original: @148a * // gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: @148a * // gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: out of ignorance,

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te /
translated: and out of fear.

original: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
analyzed: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
translated: Because of the same downfall, some monks are being expelled,

original: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: while others are not being expelled.’ And why is that?

original: dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: “Monks, you should not go to families out of desire,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: out of hatred,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: out of delusion,

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
translated: or out of fear.

original: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa bdag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa bdag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
translated: Venerables, you are householders who are guilty of evil conduct.

original: khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
analyzed: khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
translated: You see, hear, and know that you have been defaming families.

original: khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: You see, hear, and know that you are guilty of evil conduct.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: Venerables, you should abandon these words: ‘We go out of desire,’ ‘We go out of hatred,’

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: ‘We go out of delusion,’

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig / de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig / de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
translated: and ‘We go out of fear.’ This is the first thing to be done.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na /
translated: If the monks admonish them, but they still insist on their position, hold to it, and continue to promote it,

original: de dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: then they should be admonished with a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three proclamations.

original: 'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: This is how it should be done.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te /
translated: A bedding arrangement should be made, the gaṇḍī should be struck,

original: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: and the monks should be informed by means of a proclamation.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //🔽'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: When the entire saṅgha is present and agrees, a monk should recite the motion and carry out the procedure.🔽This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should sit down and say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerables, please listen!

original: dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyis par 'tshal bzhin du /
analyzed: dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyis par 'tshal bzhin du /
translated: The monks Acyuta and Upasena, having gone to the mountain of reeds, have performed the act of banishing these two.

original: de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi /
analyzed: de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi /
translated: They say that they are going because of desire,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of hatred,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of ignorance,

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing /
translated: and going because of fear.

original: dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces /
translated: They also say to the monks,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
translated: ‘Venerable ones, here some monks are going because of desire,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of hatred,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of ignorance,

original: 'jigs @148b pas 'gro ba dag yin te /
analyzed: 'jigs @148b pas 'gro ba dag yin te /
translated: and going because of fear.

original: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
analyzed: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed /
translated: In this way, some monks are expelled for the same kind of downfall,

original: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes mchi nas /
translated: while others are not expelled.’

original: 'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na /🔽gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ril dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro
analyzed: 'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na / gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ril dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro
translated: Although many monks have tried to reason with them, they have obstinately held on to their position, insisting that it is true and all else false.🔽If the time of the Saṅgha is right and it is agreeable, the Saṅgha should give its approval.🔽The Saṅgha is dismissing the monks Hastaka and Avyūṣita.

original: ba zhes ma zer cig / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: ba zhes ma zer cig / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: Venerables Hastaka and Avyūṣita, do not say that you are going to the elders and the most venerable monks out of a sense of duty,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: out of hatred,🔽or out of delusion.

original: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
analyzed: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig / dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
translated: And to the monks he said, “Venerables, do not say that some monks are going because of desire,

original: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of hatred,

original: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
analyzed: gti mug gis 'gro ba /
translated: going because of delusion,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do //

translated: Venerable Saṅgharakṣita, give up this kind of action that makes you unfit to be spoken to.”

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //

original: pa na / tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig cang rung bdag la ci yang ma smra shig / bdag kyang dge yang rung sdig kyang rung tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci yang mi smra'o //

analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //

translated: At the point of the downfall of relinquishing the three robes, it is said that if a fully ordained monk who has finished his robes and for whom the retreat has ended separates from any of the three robes, even for a single night, except with the approval of the community, he commits a downfall of forsaking.

original: de'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar mi nus na dge 'dun gyis de la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
