translated: If they do not give up, then the first announcement should be made.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The procedure is as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: These two novices, Kaṭhina and Mahākaṭhina, have developed the following sinful view:

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‘Those things that the Blessed One said are obstacles, when we practice them, they do not become obstacles.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes mchi nas /
translated: We understand the Dharma as taught by the Blessed One in this way.’

original: 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
analyzed: 'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na /
translated: Many monks have admonished them,

original: 'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba
analyzed: 'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs nas 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba
translated: Even though the saṅgha has admonished them twice, they still insist that their view is correct, saying, “This is the truth, the rest is false.”

original: dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na /
analyzed: dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na /
translated: The saṅgha should admonish them a third time.

original: 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
analyzed: 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te /
translated: Even though the saṅgha has admonished them three times, they still insist that their view is correct, saying, “This is the truth, the rest is false.”

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la /
translated: Therefore, the saṅgha should not lift the suspension of the novice monks Kaṭa and Mahānāma for not relinquishing their wrong views.

original: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis deng phyin chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang
analyzed: tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis deng phyin chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ston pa'o zhes ma zer cig / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gang
translated: You two, Kṣudrapanthaka and Mahāpanthaka, from now on do not say, The Bhagavān, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One is our teacher!

original: yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shing //
analyzed: yang rung ba'i phyi bzhin du yang ma 'gro shing //
translated: Do not follow any wise fellow practitioner who is like a guru.

original: dge slong rnams dang @166b dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyed la med de /
analyzed: dge slong rnams dang @166b dge tshul lhan cig nub gnyis tshun chad gnas gcig tu nyal du dbang ba gang yin pa de yang deng phyin chad khyed la med de /
translated: You two are no longer allowed to sleep together with the monks and novices for more than two nights.

original: mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad na /
analyzed: mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bsnyil gyis gzhan du song shig ces bsnyil ba'i phrin las mdzad na /
translated: You two deluded men are expelled. Go elsewhere!

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la bsnyil pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la bsnyil pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
translated: If it is not approved, then let them speak.

original: shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o //
analyzed: shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o //
translated: This is the first announcement.

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: After that, a single bhikṣu should tell the novice, ‘The saṅgha will perform the action of the four-announcement ceremony for you.

original: las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyis /
analyzed: las brjod pa dang po yang mdzad lags kyis /
translated: The first announcement has been made.

original: khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: You should abandon this kind of sinful view.’

original: de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtod na de lta na legs /
analyzed: de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtod na de lta na legs /
translated: If, when told this, he gives up that basis, then that is good.

original: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya'o //
translated: If he does not give it up, then after that the second announcement should be made.

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang /
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas nas kyang /
translated: After the second announcement has been made,

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las /
translated: Then, a second monk should tell the novice monk, “The Saṅgha has done the legal procedure of the first announcement against you.

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyis /
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa yang mdzad lags kyis /
translated: It has done the second announcement.

original: khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o ;
analyzed: khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o ;
translated: Give up this kind of sinful view.”

original: / de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: / de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If, at this, he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa bya'o //
translated: But if he does not give it up, then, after that, the third announcement should be made.

original: las brjod pa gsum pa byas nas kyang /
analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa byas nas kyang /
translated: And after the third announcement has been made,

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las ;
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mdzad par 'gyur ba las ;
translated: a second monk should tell the novice monk, “The Saṅgha has done the legal procedure of the first announcement against you.🔽It has done the second announcement.

original: las brjod pa gsum pa yang mdzad lags kyis /
analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa yang mdzad lags kyis /
translated: It has done the third announcement.

original: khyed sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyed sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Give up this kind of sinful view.”

original: de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
analyzed: de skad bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
translated: If, when this is announced, he gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu mjug bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu mjug bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: But if he does not give it up, then the conclusion is as follows:

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
translated: If the Saṅgha accepts and approves of it,

original: dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyil pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te /
translated: then the Saṅgha will perform the act of reconciliation against the novices Kaṇṭaka and Mahākaṇṭaka by means of a legal procedure of announcement and asking three times.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Since there is silence, I will hold this as the Saṅgha’s acceptance.”

original: de ni dge tshul bsnyil pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni dge tshul bsnyil pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the rite and procedure for the reconciliation of a novice.

original: bslab ba dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor @167a * //
analyzed: bslab ba dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor @167a * //
translated: The individual confession for entering the home of a layperson after breaking training

original: bshags par bya ba'i skabs nas spyin bdag longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su zad de yongs su mthar thug par gyur ba la bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: bshags par bya ba'i skabs nas spyin bdag longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su zad de yongs su mthar thug par gyur ba la bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The section on individual confession states, “The training vow should be given to a benefactor whose wealth has been depleted, whose wealth has been exhausted, and who has reached the end of his wealth.” This is how it should be done.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: Having prepared the seats and struck the gandi, he should inform the monks with the announcement.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o //🔽'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: When the entire Saṅgha is seated and has come together, a monk should make a motion.🔽This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug pa la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should say to those seated:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!

original: dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan cing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te /
analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan cing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te /
translated: The general Siṃha is faithful, good, and has virtuous intentions.

original: de sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: de sangs rgyas sam /
translated: He has offered to the Buddha,

original: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
translated: the Dharma, the Saṅgha,

original: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams lam phul ba'am /
analyzed: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams lam phul ba'am /
translated: or to monks who are pleasing to him,

original: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
translated: and there is nothing that he has not given up.

original: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug na /
analyzed: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug na /
translated: By offering and giving in this way, his wealth has been depleted, exhausted, and brought to an end.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bcing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal to //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bcing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal to //
translated: The Saṅgha is giving the training to the general Siṅgha.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.🔽The Saṅgha has given the training to the general Siṅgha.

original: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sngom pa byin pa der dge slong gis khyim du 'gro bar bya //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sngom pa byin pa der dge slong gis khyim du 'gro bar bya //
translated: The monk should go to the house of the general Siṅgha.

original: stan la longs spyad par bya /
analyzed: stan la longs spyad par bya /
translated: He should use the seat.

original: chos bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: chos bstan par bya'o //
translated: He should teach the Dharma.

original: bsod snyoms blang bar mi bya /
analyzed: bsod snyoms blang bar mi bya /
translated: He should not accept almsfood.

original: lhung bzed stong pas 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed stong pas 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not enter with an empty bowl.

original: de'i byis pa slong ba dag la bca' ba ril por mi sbyin par dum bur byas te spyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i byis pa slong ba dag la bca' ba ril por mi sbyin par dum bur byas te spyin par bya'o //
translated: He should not give whole morsels to the children who beg from him, but should give them after breaking them up.

original: ga gon dang la phug la sogs pa 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag dang ldam ltum la sogs pa tshod ma khyim nas 'byung ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ga gon dang la phug la sogs pa 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag dang ldam ltum la sogs pa tshod ma khyim nas 'byung ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: He should accept from the house the fruits and roots, such as eggplant and radish, and the vegetables, such as mustard greens.

original: de ni bslab pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa spyin pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni bslab pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa spyin pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the procedure for giving the training in the house to the general Siṅgha.

original: de nyid kyi skabs nas sbyin bdag de longs spyod dag 'phel bar gyur pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi skabs nas sbyin bdag de longs spyod dag 'phel bar gyur pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: This is done as follows:

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: The bedding should be prepared, the gaṇḍī should be struck, and the monks should be summoned with the proclamation.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la sbyin bdag des phyag @167b 'tshal te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la sbyin bdag des phyag @167b 'tshal te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: When the entire saṅgha is present and has agreed, the householder should prostrate to the saṅgha, sit in front of the most senior monk, place his palms together, and say the following:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṅgha, please listen!

original: bdag dmag dpon seng ge dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge pa'i bsam pa can te /🔽bdag gis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bdag dmag dpon seng ge dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge pa'i bsam pa can te / bdag gis 'di lta ste /
translated: I, the general Siṃha, am faithful, good, and have a virtuous mind.

original: sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sam /
translated: I have not given to the Buddha,

original: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
translated: the Dharma, the saṅgha,

original: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am /
analyzed: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am /
translated: or to monks who are pleasing to me.

original: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
translated: There is nothing at all that I have not given away.

original: bdag gis de ltar phul zhing de ltar yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
analyzed: bdag gis de ltar phul zhing de ltar yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
translated: Having given in this way and relinquished in this way, my enjoyments have been exhausted and used up.

original: yongs su mthar thug nas dge 'dun don bzhed pa /
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug nas dge 'dun don bzhed pa /
translated: Having completely finished them, I request the Saṅgha, who wishes to benefit me,

original: phan pa bzhed pas bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba bas /
analyzed: phan pa bzhed pas bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba bas /
translated: to give me the training precepts.

original: bdag dmag dpon seng ge yang longs spyod 'phel nas /
analyzed: bdag dmag dpon seng ge yang longs spyod 'phel nas /
translated: Since my enjoyments have increased,

original: bdag dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal pa bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par gsol na /
analyzed: bdag dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal pa bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par gsol na /
translated: I request the Saṅgha to destroy the training precepts that I have been given.

original: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par stsal du gsol /
analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par stsal du gsol /
translated: Therefore, O noble Saṅgha, out of compassion, I request that you destroy the training precepts that I have been given.”

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: Repeat this three times.

original: de ni bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig pa gsol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig pa gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the request to destroy the training precepts.

analyzed: de'i 'og tu spyin bdag de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: Then, having dismissed the patron from the vicinity of the hearing, he should be placed in the vicinity of the seeing, and a single monk should perform the proclamation of the single motion.🔽This is how it should be done.

analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Sitting down, he should say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /

analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge de ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge pa'i bsam pa can te ;
translated: That general Siṃha is faithful, good, and has virtuous intentions.

original: des sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: des sangs rgyas sam /
translated: He has not offered anything to the Buddha,

original: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
translated: the Dharma, the saṅgha,

analyzed: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am /
translated: or to agreeable monks,

original: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
translated: and has not given anything away.

original: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
analyzed: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
translated: By offering and giving in that way, his enjoyments have diminished and been exhausted,🔽and have come to an end.

original: yongs su mthar thug nas de la dge 'dun don bzhed pa /
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug nas de la dge 'dun don bzhed pa /
translated: The saṅgha, desiring his benefit,

original: phan pa bzhed pas bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal ba las /
analyzed: phan pa bzhed pas bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal ba las /
translated: should grant the training vow.

original: dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te /
analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te /
translated: That general Siṃha, his enjoyments having increased,

original: dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal ba dge 'dun las bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par gsol na /
analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sngom pa stsal ba dge 'dun las bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par gsol na /
translated: The general Siṃha has requested the Saṅgha to destroy the training vows.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod @168a * //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod @168a * //
translated: If it seems appropriate to the Saṅgha and they accept it,

original: na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par mdzad do //
analyzed: na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig par mdzad do //
translated: then the Saṅgha will destroy the training vows of the general Siṃha.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sngom pa bshig pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'gro bar bya /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sngom pa bshig pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'gro bar bya /
translated: The monks should go to where the training vows are destroyed.

original: stan la longs spyad par bya /
analyzed: stan la longs spyad par bya /
translated: They should use the seats.

original: bsod snyoms blang bar bya /
analyzed: bsod snyoms blang bar bya /
translated: They should accept alms.

original: chos bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: chos bstan par bya'o //
translated: They should teach the Dharma.

original: de ni bslab pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni bslab pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sngom pa gzhig pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the ritual and the rite for destroying the training vows of the householder in the training.

original: so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The ritual and the mantra for informing the Saṅgha of the confession are as follows:

original: mtshams kyi nang na dge slong ji snyed 'khod pa thams cad bsdu ba ni mi dgos te /
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang na dge slong ji snyed 'khod pa thams cad bsdu ba ni mi dgos te /
translated: It is not necessary to gather all the monks who are in the monastery.

original: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong de dag la phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong de dag la phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Having gone to the monastery, he should pay respect to those monks he sees, in such a way that it is known to those who are in the temple and so forth.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, sitting in front of the seniormost monk, with palms together, he should say:

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gi chos de so sor 'chags so zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gi chos de so sor 'chags so zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o //
translated: Venerable ones, I have committed a downfall that is a basis of shame, unbecoming, that should be confessed individually. I confess that offense.

original: 'di ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam pa brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam pa brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is said to be confession by expressing regret, but it is not the actual confession.

original: bshags pa ni ji ltar lhung byed kyi lhung ba byung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags pa bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bshags pa ni ji ltar lhung byed kyi lhung ba byung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags pa bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: Confession is like the confession made in the presence of one person when a downfall that requires confession alone has occurred.

original: de ni so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so //
analyzed: de ni so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so //
translated: This is the rite and mantra for confessing to the saṅgha.

original: nags ma brtags pa las gyur pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba'i skabs nas /
analyzed: nags ma brtags pa las gyur pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba'i skabs nas /
translated: The section on the confession to be made for the offense of not examining the site of the monastery states:

original: dge slong nags nyul ba bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong nags nyul ba bsko bar bya'o //
translated: “Appoint a monk to inspect the site of the monastery.”

original: zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /🔽dge slong nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa la yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa la yang dbyung ba bya ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste / dge slong nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa la yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa la yang dbyung ba bya ste /
translated: This is how it is done.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: A monk who is inspecting the site of the monastery should not be appointed if he has five qualities, and if he has been appointed, he should be dismissed:

original: 'dun pas 'gro pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / nags nyul ba dang ma nyul pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas 'gro pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / nags nyul ba dang ma nyul pa mi shes pa'o //
translated: he goes out of desire, he goes out of hatred, he goes out of ignorance, he goes out of fear, and he does not know what has and has not been inspected.

original: nags nyul pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
analyzed: nags nyul pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
translated: One who roams in the forest and possesses five qualities should be appointed even if he has not been nominated.

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
translated: And one who has been appointed should not be removed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas @168b mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / nags nyul ba dang ma nyul ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas @168b mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / nags nyul ba dang ma nyul ba shes pa'o //
translated: He does not go out of desire, hatred, confusion, or fear, and he knows what has and has not been inspected in the forest.

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
translated: This is how he should be appointed.

original: je dang po spro ba byas te /
analyzed: je dang po spro ba byas te /
translated: First, he should be encouraged.

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: “Are you, so-and-so, able to roam in the forest on behalf of the Sangha?”

original: gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i bdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o // de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i bdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: If he is able, he should say, “I am able.”🔽After that, he should prepare a sleeping place, sound the gandi, and inform the monks with an announcement.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: When the whole Sangha is present and agrees, a monk should be asked to do the legal procedure of appointing him.

original: 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: It is done like this.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having sat down, one should say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /🔽dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul par spro na /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul par spro na /
translated: “O Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!🔽If this Venerable Saṅgha agrees, the Saṅgha will allow this.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar bsgo te /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar bsgo te /
translated: The Saṅgha will appoint the monk named so-and-so as the forest-dweller.

original: dge slong nags nyul ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul lo //
analyzed: dge slong nags nyul ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul lo //
translated: The monk named so-and-so, who is the forest-dweller, is the forest-dweller of the Saṅgha.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is done like this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /🔽dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na /🔽de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsgos te /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na / de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsgos te /
translated: “O Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!🔽If this Venerable Saṅgha agrees, the Saṅgha will appoint the monk named so-and-so as the forest-dweller.

original: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul na /
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul na /
translated: For that reason, the Saṅgha will appoint the monk named so-and-so as the forest-dweller.🔽The monk named so-and-so, who is the forest-dweller, is the forest-dweller of the Saṅgha.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /
translated: “Those who agree to appoint the monk so-and-so as the forest ranger should remain silent.🔽Those who do not agree should speak.🔽The Saṅgha has agreed to appoint the monk so-and-so as the forest ranger.

original: gang dag mi bzad pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos lags pas /🔽ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun gyi nags nyul te /
analyzed: gang dag mi bzad pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos lags pas / ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun gyi nags nyul te /
translated: The Saṅgha has appointed the monk so-and-so as the forest ranger.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since there are no objections, this is my understanding.”

original: dge slong nags nyul pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong nags nyul pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: “The monk who is the forest ranger should follow this procedure.

analyzed: dge slong nags nyul par dpag tshad phyed nas bzung ste khor yug tu nags nyul bar bya'o //

original: de gal te 'dod na khyi'i sus spyin zhing grogs kyang bsko par bya'o //
analyzed: de gal te 'dod na khyi'i sus spyin zhing grogs kyang bsko par bya'o //
translated: If he wishes, he may appoint a dog-keeper and a companion.

original: gal te nags 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin na des dud brda btul @169a * //
analyzed: gal te nags 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin na des dud brda btul @169a * //
translated: If the forest is dangerous, he should set up a signal with smoke.

original: bar bya ; ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya /
analyzed: bar bya ; ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya /
translated: One should plant a blue flag.

original: 'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam khar bzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam khar bzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place a branch with leaves on the path.

original: gal te nags 'jigs pa med pa nyid yin na ba dan dkar po bsgreng bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nags 'jigs pa med pa nyid yin na ba dan dkar po bsgreng bar bya'o //
translated: If the forest is free from danger, one should plant a white flag.

original: de ni nags nyul pa bsko pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni nags nyul pa bsko pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the rite and the procedure for appointing the forest-dweller.

original: dge slong gi rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: dge slong gi rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The rites and procedures of the chapter on the analysis of monks are complete.🔽Now, the rites and procedures of the chapter on the analysis of nuns should be stated.

original: // / da ni dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams brjod par bya ste /
translated: The summary:🔽The opposite, abandoning relatives,🔽depending on quarrels, entering,

analyzed: sngom la / bzlog dang nye du spong ba dang / 'thab krol brten dang 'jug dang / dge 'dun byed dang de rjes phyogs //
translated: the Saṅgha doing, and following that,🔽censuring, disliking the instruction,🔽old, suitable, unrelated,🔽informing, petition, Dharma robe,🔽face, side, instructing,

original: sun 'byin bka' blo mi bde dang // rgan dang rung dang 'brel med dang // go byed gsol ba chos gos dang // ngor dang gzhogs 'phyas bsgo ba dang // cang mi smra dang bu dang 'khor //
analyzed: sun 'byin bka' blo mi bde dang // rgan dang rung dang 'brel med dang // go byed gsol ba chos gos dang // ngor dang gzhogs 'phyas bsgo ba dang // cang mi smra dang bu dang 'khor //
translated: silent, son, retinue,

analyzed: mang dang bslab dang gzhig bshags pa'i //
translated: The chapter on the many, training, and the basis for confession

analyzed: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin // bzlog pa'i pham par 'gyur ba'i skabs nas gnas nas phyung pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong ma la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: is the correct summary.

analyzed: dge slong ma gang dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad de /
translated: The section on the defeating offenses to be reversed should be done like this: A nun who, knowing that a monk's Saṅgha has performed the act of ejecting a monk,

analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sngom pa byin pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol bar shes bzhin du de zlog par byed na dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo
translated: and that a nun's Saṅgha has given the penance of not deserving veneration to him, reverses it when she has asked for forgiveness from the Saṅgha of monks, should be corrected by the nuns.

analyzed: bar bya'o // 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste /
translated: She should be corrected like this:

original: sbom dga' mo khyod dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas nas dbyung pa'i phrin las mdzad de /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo khyod dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang gnas nas dbyung pa'i phrin las mdzad de /
translated: “Bhadrapālā, the united saṅgha of monks has performed the act of ejecting a monk.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sngom pa byin pa skra 'greng bar 'gyur /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sngom pa byin pa skra 'greng bar 'gyur /
translated: The united saṅgha of nuns has given the vow of being unworthy of homage.🔽Your hair is standing on end,

original: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed /
analyzed: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed /
translated: your hair is bristling, and you are pulling out the monks’ hair.

original: 'byung bar bskyod /
analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /
translated: You are causing the elements to move,

original: mtshungs par nye par ston la /
analyzed: mtshungs par nye par ston la /
translated: you are teaching in a similar way,🔽and you are sitting inside the boundary and asking for forgiveness.

original: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod par gsol bar shes bzhin du dge slong de la 'phags pa khyod skra 'greng par 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod par gsol bar shes bzhin du dge slong de la 'phags pa khyod skra 'greng par 'gyur //
translated: You, noble one, have hair that is standing on end,

original: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing /
analyzed: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing /
translated: your hair is bristling,🔽and you are pulling out the monks’ hair.🔽Do not cause the elements to move,

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol par ma byed cig //'byung par ma bskyod cig / mtshungs par nye bar ma @169b ston cig //
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol par ma byed cig //'byung par ma bskyod cig / mtshungs par nye bar ma @169b ston cig //
translated: do not teach in a similar way,

original: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod pa ma gsol cig //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod pa ma gsol cig //
translated: and do not sit inside the boundary and ask for forgiveness.

original: bdag gis 'phags pa khyod la lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags dang / klag pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / 'phags pa la ci dang cis brel ba de dang des mi brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes de skad ma zer cig /'phags ma khyod gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di thong shig / de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gis 'phags pa khyod la lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags dang / klag pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / 'phags pa la ci dang cis brel ba de dang des mi brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes de skad ma zer cig /'phags ma khyod gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di thong shig / de ni dus dang por bya ba'o //
translated: This is the first action.

original: dge slong ma rnams kyis de bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams kyis de bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar
translated: If the bhikṣuṇīs admonish her in this way but she still insists on her position, holds to it firmly, and continues to say, “This is the truth and the rest is false,” then the four-part formal procedure of requesting forbearance should be performed against her.
